Listen, I wanted to ask if you repair weapons?

I'm not a repairman. I can only exchange only, and for just one weapon in the Zone. A truly unique weapon, though two were made. The first was crafted for an experienced Stalker named of Strelok. Where he is now, and where the weapon is, I don't know. But I knew the man who made it, and he made another afterwards. A truncated automatic AK-74, with a fixed suppressor and a butt carved especially to the client. The rifle has fixed optics and an increased rate of fire. Strelok was a master and known to prefer a close contact fight
And where is the master who made these weapons?

He was lost... Taken by one of the Zone's many anomalies... The weapon remained, and entered my possession, but I've no need for it other than as a collector's item. It's in pristine condition, and I'd happily exchange it for Strelok's original, which must be in pretty poor condition by now, knowing what he got up to... Oh, plus a 30,000Ru service fee to cover custom internal parts and specialized labour... If you ever find this weapon, don't throw it out. We can help each other gain something very, very special...
Understood. Thanks
Hi, Adrenalin. You said you wanted to exchange a new identical model for Strelok's original AK-74 automatic?
Yes, I would definitely honour such an agreement...
Here. The original weapon, and your thirty thousand service fee
Wow! Where did you find it? As I promised, I'll give you the new one in exchange. Are you sure?
Sorry, I can't tell you where I found it, but here's the original and the money. We've helped each other...
Professor, I've been wanting to ask you something, but you've kept me so busy... I need to know what time the helicopter will arrive?
Strange, how did you learn about that? Or are we talking about different things?
Im talking about the military helicopter. I've heard they will sell a mini-gun...

Unfortunately, I'm not an intermediary in this kind of business. It would be better if you spoke to them yourself. Also you're in luck. Before you arrived they contacted me, and should be arriving at the bunker in a couple of minutes
Thank you professor. I will go and look. I hope that these military morons don't shoot on sight at everything that moves...
Greetings stalker, you must either be brave or just plain stupid to approach a military helicopter

Im just a major, however you flatter me. A good strategy. I wonder where you got this info about me... The Gun really is not for sale, I was bringing it to be installed on the professors helicopter. What I propose is not difficult, however we are short of helicopters and people are now worth their weight in gold. I just cant spare the manpower. Go talk to Sakharov and he will supply you with a detecor that will let you know when your within 10 metres of the target. The pilot, of the helicopter shot down over the wild territory, had instructions to dump the classified material if about to crash. And this is what happened, he ejected it. So, what I need you to do is go get the detector from Sakharov and find this classified object. Its probably in the area where the helicopter was first hit
Well, I will look. I hope this deal is not a trick
Professor, I'm here for the detector that you made for the military. The major instructed me to go on the Wild Territory and find something, then bring it to you in exchange for the Minigun...

Well this is odd.. I thought you didn't get on too well with the military... Yes, I've made the detector, but exactly what you're searching for I don't know. When you get within range it will beep and transmit a message to your PDA. Then you can take this ridiculously large machine gun away, which is just taking up space here. Here's the detector.
